subject: Legal opinion on contract clauses and other aspects.
text: HRd4 <fy <TTHTf grfearut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (17 9a87, 43F 9Ra6- 3t TTTAT HATT4 Extn, 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping: Road Transport & Highways) 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/21/2002-Admn: January 28, 2005 POLICY MATTER A ADMINISTRATIONFINANCE (96/2005) (Decision taken on EA to Chairman'$ Note No. 11011/1/2004/EA) Sub: Legal opinion on Contract clauses and other aspects It has been observed that most of the matters related to Contract clauses and other aspects are being referred to legal experts at various levels resulting in delay in decisions making: In view of the above it has been decided that those matters in which decisions cannot be taken without referring to the legal expert; will be referred for legal opinions with the approval of Member (concerned) Chairman: This issues with the approval of Chairman: Ml" (G.P.
